trans-unit.source: An activity that demarcates a transaction boundary.
When this activity begins executing, a new <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> is started if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업의 실행을 시작하면 새 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>이 시작됩니다(없는 경우).

trans-unit.source: The transaction commits when the activity and all other participants in the transaction have completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션의 활동 및 다른 모든 참가자가 성공적으로 완료되면 트랜잭션이 커밋됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> activity member of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> activity that is the child of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> will not execute if an unhandled exception propagates past the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> boundary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> 활동 멤버의는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> 자식 활동은 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> 지나서 처리 되지 않은 예외에서 전파 실행 되지 것입니다는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> 경계입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> 활동을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Basic TransactionScope](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) sample.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> class.
The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> 활동을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Basic TransactionScope](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) sample.
Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the workflow should be aborted if the transaction aborts.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션이 중단되면 워크플로를 중단할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow should be aborted.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />를 실행할 때 예약되는 활동을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> executes.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> should be serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> 속성 값을 serialize해야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> should be serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> 속성 값을 serialize해야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />에 사용되는 트랜잭션의 제한 시간을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />에 사용되는 트랜잭션의 제한 시간을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The following code sample demonstrates setting the Timeout property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> 활동의 Timeout 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Basic TransactionScope](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) sample.
